alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:13PM EDT until June 13 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 413 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Bonifay, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bonifay, Bradford, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Douglass Crossroad, Whitehead Crossroads, Five Points, Hulaw, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Poplar Head, Sylvania and Johnson Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
